projects.title: AskMyPDF - AI-Powered PDF Chat Interface
description: Built a web-based application that allows users to upload and interact with large PDF documents via an intelligent chat interface.
Implemented AI-generated answers with precise citations, enabling users to ask questions about document content and receive accurate responses with exact page references.
Integrated a smooth PDF viewer that enables direct navigation to referenced pages, creating a seamless document exploration experience.
Designed an intuitive user interface that combines document viewing with conversational AI for enhanced productivity and document analysis.

projects.title: One Stop Bath
description: Created a full-stack e-commerce platform featuring dynamic product management, secure user authentication, and responsive design for a seamless user experience on all devices.
Integrated Context API for efficient cart management, implemented coupon code functionality, and ensured smooth user interactions.
Developed APIs for user data handling and payment processing, and integrated Razorpay for secure transactions.

projects.title: Academic Management System (AMS)
description: Led development of AMS for efficient student data management.

Developed three distinct dashboards tailored for teachers, enabling seamless CRUD operations and empowering educators to efficiently manage student records.Ensured precise student classification by department and course.
Leveraged advanced technologies including C#, MVC Architecture, ASP.NET Core, and SQL Triggers to create a robust and user-friendly platform for academic administration

projects.title: Portfolio Website
description: Conceptualized and implemented a dynamic portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements in a visually engaging and user-friendly format.

projects.title: Kenil Shah & Co
description: Developed a professional website for Kenil Shah & Co firm with responsive design that adapts seamlessly to all devices.
Implemented smooth animations and transitions using Framer Motion to enhance user experience and create an engaging interface.
Created a modern, user-friendly website using Next.js, optimizing performance and SEO while ensuring cross-browser compatibility.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard Tool
description: Developed a comprehensive analytics dashboard with 6 distinct card views, each displaying data in different visualization formats including bar charts and line graphs.
Implemented design ensuring interactive data filtering and sorting capabilities.
Built a full-stack solution with React frontend for dynamic data visualization and Node.js backend with PostgreSQL for efficient data storage and retrieval.

projects.title: Insights Dashboard
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive mobile-responsive analytics dashboard with three main sections: Overview, Insights, and Demographics.
Implemented an interactive world map visualization in the Demographics section to display geographical data distribution and patterns.
Created a user-friendly interface with intuitive navigation, customizable filters, and responsive design ensuring optimal viewing experience across all devices.
